title: Rice Krispie Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['200g butter or cooking margarine', '200g caster sugar', '70g dark soft brown sugar', '120ml honey', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '20g rice krispies', '40g porridge oats', '180g dark chocolate chips', '180g milk chocolate chips']
